titleStmt.title: James the Second, by the grace of God King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, defender of the faith, &c. to all and singular archbishops, archdeacons, deans, and their officials parsons, vicars, curates, and all other spiritual persons ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

notesStmt.note: Title from first 3 lines of text.
For relief of Huguenot refugees in England.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
